sentences: Konstanty Wileński (born Kostyantyn Mykhailovych Vilensky Ukrainian: Костянтин Михайлович Віленський 25 December 1949 in Kiev, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union) is a Ukrainian and Polish pianist, composer and jazz musician.
Born to a family of Kiev musicians, he is a grandson (by adoption) of Illya Vilensky (1896–1975), the first director of the Kiev Philharmonic Hall and founder of three musical theaters.
